post.title: Building Taxonomy
post.subtitle: Simplified Building Taxonomy of Selected Cities
post.excerpt: Utilizing OSM data with different APIs to plot minimalistic 'small multiple' chart...
post.citation: Visualization 'Building Taxonomy' (2024), Vitaliy Y from Witold's Data Consulting

content.text: Plot a simplified taxonomy of buildings across selected cities using PyData, QuackOSM, and Metaflow. Inspired by Daniel Gorokhovâ€™s work: https://example.com.
